question: List lounges and observation decks with accessibility options for all people.
sql_query1:
SELECT Lounge.name
FROM Lounge
WHERE Lounge.Accessibility = "All"
UNION
SELECT ObservationDeck.name
FROM ObservationDeck
WHERE ObservationDeck.Accessibility = "All"
sql_query2:
SELECT Lounge.name
FROM Lounge
UNION
SELECT ObservationDeck.name
FROM ObservationDeck
WHERE ObservationDeck.Accessibility = "All"
interpretation1: What lounges have accessibility options for all people and what observation decks have the same accessibility?
interpretation2: List all lounges and also list observation decks with accessibility options for all people.
